segments.text: The air feels thick with the tension of the moment; it’s almost palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman, her face calm, while chaos simmers behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's hand disappears into the cookie jar, and I can’t help but chuckle a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that laugh quickly disappears when I remember the dangers they’re courting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s hopeful anticipation makes it all the more bittersweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they even think about the risks they’re taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Something as simple as reaching for a cookie seems so innocent yet so reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR
